entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is described as a highly unusual boy in many ways. He is said to hate the summer holidays more than any other time of year and wants to do his homework but does it in secret.

entities.name: bathilda bagshot
entities.description: Bathilda Bagshot is mentioned as the author of a book called 'A History of Magic'.

relationships.description: Harry Potter reads from a book written by Bathilda Bagshot, indicating that she is the author of 'A History of Magic'.
